alert.note: Alert for Cayuga; Onondaga; Seneca; Yates (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 07 at 6:01PM EDT until August 07 at 7:00PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: The National Weather Service in Binghamton has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Seneca County in central New York... North central Yates County in central New York... Northwestern Cayuga County in central New York... Northwestern Onondaga County in central New York... * Until 700 PM EDT. * At 601 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles east of Fair Haven Beach State Park to near Weedsport to near Kendaia, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Auburn, Lysander, Van Buren, Baldwinsville, Seneca Falls, Waterloo, Fayette, Sennett, Benton and Fleming. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
